entries.s_eeaf9e0b: Sorry, I don't have time right now.
entries.s_ea2d9bb0: What is it that you're doing here?
entries.s_d8a95d57: Yes, I have these computer codes that the head engineer needs, but I was attacked by these creatures. Here, the codes are on this datapad. Please take them to him.
entries.s_c3bd7233: I have the computer codes that the head engineer needs to get the reactor back online. I was on my way back to the engineering room, but I can't possibly make it there with all these creatures loose.
entries.s_c251c56d: Really? That would be fantastic! Here, the codes are on this datapad. You should be able to find him near the reactor. If the door to the engineering room is locked, the code 51892 will get you in. Thank you so much for your help.
entries.s_bf513acb: Oh, hey, you're back. I wonder if I could ask you for a favor?
entries.s_be849f7b: I have these computer codes that I need to get to the engineer, but the creatures attacked me before I could get back to him. I wonder if you could bring the codes to him for me?
entries.s_b856cb2e: Really? Would you take them back to him? They are on this datapad. Thank you so much.
entries.s_b5c70166: Please take the codes to the engineer. If you need to get into the engineering area, use the code 51892. Thank you very much for your help.
entries.s_ae1d4fd6: Please take the codes to the engineer. Thank you very much for your help.
entries.s_aa495893: OK, I understand. If you get a chance, please come back.
entries.s_950188fd: Assistant? I was told to get some codes from you?
entries.s_89ca9e86: The engineer told me to come get the codes from you.
entries.s_82bc35bf: Can you tell me anything about those monsters?
entries.s_7dfa7256: Thank you for killing those creatures. They've escaped from their cages and they're out of control.
entries.s_761ee240: I'll take the codes to the engineer for you.
entries.s_72510ac3: I'm sure you'll get there somehow. Good-bye.
entries.s_4b2c2992: Yes, I need to try and get back to the reactor room myself.
entries.s_49ef3c27: Really? That would be fantastic! Here, the codes are on this datapad. You should be able to find him near the reactor. Thank you so much for your help.
entries.s_33eb85b5: Sure, I will take the codes to the engineer.
entries.s_25e7c7e7: Thank you for delivering the codes to the engineer. You've been a great help.
entries.s_255de7f7: Not much. This is a genetic research facility, but I'm an engineering assistant. I don't know much about that stuff. But it would seem that when that earthquake hit, it somehow released the creatures from their cages.
entries.s_114e560: Actually, he just told me to come get the codes.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (biogenic_assistant.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
